column1: From my seat on the Appropriations Committee my number one priority will remain providing more resources to Mainers fighting to survive this crisis & delivering federal funds to our state. Holding this office is a sacred trust and I cannot wait to get started on the work ahead.

Congress must act with urgency to send pandemic relief directly to thousands of Mainers and millions of Americans trying to survive the pandemic defend the Affordable Care Act under dire threat and combat the climate crisis ravaging our planet.
I am humbled and grateful that Mainers have entrusted me to represent them once more in Congress. We have a titanic amount of hard work ahead of us. #mepolitics  https://t.co/M7T9FjOaV7
Folks don't listen to the nonsense coming out of Donald Trump's mouth. Votes are ALWAYS counted for days after the election. #mepolitics  https://t.co/iiEBIwzTjy

I'm asking for your vote & your vote for Democrats up & down the ballot to undo all the damage and suffering over the last 4 years.  If you haven't voted or registered yet you still have time. Polls close at 8PM. Find your polling place here: https://t.co/SvYoA4lUxx #mepolitics
Drop off your ballot if you haven't mailed it yet. https://t.co/XzRX0CBueq

So honored to receive the endorsement of the @PressHerald! I'm proud of my work to expand health care lower the cost of prescriptions fight hunger & the climate crisis. I look forward to fighting for Mainers in Congress next year! #mepolitics  Read more: https://t.co/ZMIsr5kARe https://t.co/3nDSx6htVw
I've been so proud to serve the wonderful people of Maine's 1st Congressional District and I hope I have the opportunity to continue representing them in Congress. #mepolitics
I agree that we should have public financing of campaigns! #mepolitics
The Lugar Center - McCourt School of Bipartisan Index House Scores -- 116th Congress First Session (2019) #mepolitics   https://t.co/BI3tRIzj4d https://t.co/0v6gyDpFOF
I'm proud to have a strong bipartisan rating and I will always support what's right regardless of party. #mepolitics
Health care is a human right & Congress must protect and shore up the Affordable Care Act. We need a public option. #mepolitics
It would be the height of irresponsibility to play politics with pandemic relief. State & local governments -- both red and blue states -- need funding now. #mepolitics
Tune in now for our @MainePublic 1st Congressional District debate >> https://t.co/LWRtXUpRq7 #mepolitics
Tune into @MainePublic at 8PM tonight for our final debate of the campaign. Looking forward to a lively and civil discussion! #mepolitics   https://t.co/LWRtXUpRq7

Join my colleague @PramilaJayapal & other progressive leaders in Maine to help get out the vote for @JoeBiden  @KamalaHarris and all our great #mepolitics candidates this election!  RSVP here ⬇️  https://t.co/VQYEBrqw8T
Really great chatting with @ZachBlanchard at @newscentermaine about the state of our campaign everything that’s at stake this election & my grandkids! #mepolitics   https://t.co/FbKHbogQ1Q

Tune in at 7pm tonight for the @newscentermaine CD-1 candidate forum sponsored by @AARP.  Looking forward to discussing the issues that Mainers really care about in this election #mepolitics https://t.co/VQ5F75Nr9V

Honored to earn the endorsement of the @bangordailynews! So much is at stake this election and I look forward to continue fighting for the great people of our district and all of Maine next year in Congress. #mepolitics  https://t.co/V2edKYObFQ https://t.co/eBCFSnGfMC

Tonight as President Trump stoked division and spouted falsehoods to protect himself and his failed presidency Joe Biden demonstrated true and honest leadership that will finally move us forward and put Mainers first. #mepolitics

The people of Maine need a President who will fight for them no matter what especially in the wake of an unchecked pandemic that has killed 200000 Americans wreaked havoc on the economy and shed light on Donald Trump's total disregard for science and human life. #mepolitics
